title: Lost promos because of client bug (have screenshot)
body: I was in my last game of promos. I had won 1 and lost 1. When i got to the champ select i was the first one to ban and i couldn't see any icons. I tried pressing all the buttons but nothing worked. I got a dodge penalty and lost my promos :( FeelsBadMan

replies.body: If you are still experiencing an issue, it's possible that your network is having trouble maintaining a strong connection.  In this case, you may lose sync and can't download assets.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix up your connection and prevent issues like this from happening again.  Let me know if you have any questions!
This just happened to me but i lost 3lp instead. RITO fix ur gam
